name: Squad Up - A More Lit Version of Charades
name_original: Squad Up - A More Lit Version of Charades
description:
Squad Up is the most lit version of charades ever! Gather up your friends and have them give you hints as you try and guess the word that’s on your head before the timer runs out. Your game night will never be the same again!

Decks Include:
- Hip Hop
- R&B
- Black Girl Magic
- TV Shows
- And more!

You playing or nah?
